titleStmt.title: Dolus an virtus?, or, An answer to a seditious discourse concerning the religion of England and the settlement of reformed Christianity in its due latitude to which are added, the votes of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Corbet, John, 1620-1680.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Erroneously attributed by Wing to John Corbet, this piece is a reply to Corbet's A discourse of the religion of England...(1667).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
